scenes.label: *start
texts: ポロン
We kinda scrambled to put the program together, but it worked just fine.
クロス
It was a pretty simple trick, though. I doubt they'd fall for it again.
ポロン
It worked this time and that's all that matters. Thanks, man.
Each company's disaster prevention system had its own quirks, so I had to rely on Cross's help to build the program as fast as possible.
クロス
I've got your back.
Man. This whole thing reminded me I was still a real hacker. I'd had to use my skills a whole bunch of times to help Momo today.
I'd always said that I wanted to get out of this business, yet here I was.
Anyway, we finally lost the cops.
Now all we had to do was get back to Nakano while avoiding the army.
We could think about what to do after that tomorrow.
But this whole Saving and Loading thing was still on my mind.
ポロン
Hey, super hacker. You still watchin'?
ポロン
This wouldn't have gone so smoothly without this thing you gave me.
ポロン
I don't like you, and I'm not gonna let you stay anonymous forever.
ポロン
But until I unmask you, I'm gonna use this power whenever I need it.
